data.title: Dragon Quest Wiki
data.text:
Mitsuaki Hoshino is a Japanese actor and voice actor who works for Arts Vision.

Work[edit]

Dragon Quest I CD Theater - Yoshirin, Kol's item shopkeeper

Other roles[edit]

Pok√©mon (2003) - Captain Stern in "The Spheal of Approval"

Seiju Sentai Gingaman (1998) - Houretsudou in "Chapter 21"

Samurai Sentai Shinkenger (2009) - Sasamatage in "Act 21"

Tensou Sentai Goseiger (2010) - Adoborute-G of the Vital in "Epic 37"

Dragon Ball Super (2015) - Galbi in "Valiant Mr. Satan, Work a Miracle! A Challenge from Outer Space!"
